lead_paragraph: The Cierco family is seeking to be compensated for the loss of its banking assets after the United States Treasury Department identified the principality as a likely laundering hub.

headline.main: Banking Family Plans to File Suit Against Andorra
headline.print_headline: Bank Family Plans to File Suit Against Andorra

snippet: The Cierco family is seeking to be compensated for the loss of its banking assets after the United States Treasury Department identified the principality as a likely laundering hub.
